sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Glibc-&glibc-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: bash: sh binutils: ar, as, ld, ranlib, readelf diffutils: cmp fileutils: chmod, cp, install, ln, mknod, mv, mkdir, rm, touch gcc: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp, gcc grep: egrep, grep gzip: gzip make: make mawk: mawk sed: sed sh-utils: date, expr, hostname, pwd, uname texinfo: install-info, makeinfo textutils: cat, cut, sort, tr
